assessments.status_rationale: No Eurostat flash reading for August core HICP is cited in today’s news; the release is due by the stated deadline.
ISM Services PMI (August) is scheduled for release on Sept. 5; no result appears in the news items.
The August U.S. unemployment rate will be reported with the September jobs release; no outcome reported yet.
No mention of Henry Hub front-month settles at or above $3.20/MMBtu; the window remains open through Oct. 15.
No FOMC decision has been made; headlines reference September rate-cut expectations but not an official action or size.
August CPI data are not yet released (due Sept. 11); today’s news includes only July U.S. core PCE, which does not resolve this.
The performance window has just begun; no evidence on end-period relative returns between SOXX and QQQ.
